text: Læw brrda bukhkhl chan na sung ptiseth sraththa cak klum chn khxng khea klaw wa rea mi hen than pen xun dı nxkcak samay chn chen rea læa rea mi hen phu dı ptibati tam than nxkcak brrda phu tacha khxng phwk rea thi mi khwam khidhen tun «læa rea mi hen wa phwk than praserith kwa phwk rea tæ rea khid wa phwk than pen phwk kohk
